feature_engineering.disability_score: Sum of DEAR, DEYE, DPHY, DREM, DDRS, DOUT (0-6)
feature_engineering.race_columns: One-hot from RACWHT, RACBLK, RACASN, RACAIAN+RACNH+RACPI, RACSOR
feature_engineering.education_tier: SCHL mapped to 0-4 (No HS, HS, Some College, Bachelors, Advanced)

dropped_features.PRIVCOV: Replaced by has_insurance (binary) — was 0.32 importance, possible quasi-leakage
dropped_features.PUBCOV: Replaced by has_insurance (binary) — Medi-Cal requires poverty-level income
dropped_features.RAC1P: Replaced by one-hot race columns — label encoding was methodologically wrong
dropped_features.POBP: Dropped — high cardinality (200+ places of birth)
dropped_features.year: Dropped — no temporal drift detected in random vs temporal split analysis
